Imagery Description: Body: (a) HalfNon Sepcifieddraped youth, seated woman, draped woman with red sphendone, (b) seated draped woman and standing youth, with drapery over his shoulders. Lid: female heads, on both the lekanis and lebes portions.
Additional Notes: From the same tomb come several other vases by this painter (inv. 4832Non Sepcified6), as well as two decorated only with female heads by the Painter ofNaples 2585 (inv. 4834—5).
